showScoreExcerpt: "For a light, frothy evening out, this immersive show is your ticket, but don’t expect anything to last longer than the bubbles in the champagne they’re selling. Try reading the book."

keyPhrases.quote: For a light, frothy evening out, this immersive show is your ticket
don't expect anything to last longer than the bubbles in the champagne

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic gives a qualified recommendation for entertainment value but clearly signals the show lacks substance and suggests the source material is superior. | GPT-4o-mini: The review suggests a lack of substance and recommends an alternative to the show, indicating a clear negative sentiment. | Note: Models differed by 13 points.
